response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, making it an indispensable tool for your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe its true worth is $10,000 to you. However, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your operations or personal projects. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
